name: Triceps Extensions on Cable
how_to_perform:
1. Stand facing the cable machine with the tricep bar at chest height.
2. Grasp the bar with your hands shoulder-width apart and a slightly wider grip than you have when doing the bench press.
3. Extend your arms fully on the downward phase of the movement while keeping your back straight.
4. Slowly lower the bar down to your thighs but do not allow it to touch, keep control throughout the exercise.
5. Push your hands through the tricep extension apparatus until you have extended your elbows.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions
short_summary: Triceps extensions on cable are a isolation weight training device exercise that primarily targets the triceps muscle group.
